Module idatt1002.project.k2
Package org.edu.ntnu.idatt1002.techn.Tournament

Class SingleElimination

java.lang.Object
org.edu.ntnu.idatt1002.techn.Tournament.Tournament
org.edu.ntnu.idatt1002.techn.Tournament.SingleElimination
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SingleElimination extends Tournament
the class for a single elimination tournament. Here, the point is that the teams will be placed into brackets. If there are not enough teams to complete the bracket, bypass-teams will be added, and the teams facing them will win on "walkover". One loss, and you're out from this tournament
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createTournament

      public void createTournament()
      this method sets up the tournament by filling in bypasses, and shuffling the teams. It then sets up the first bracket round.
      Specified by:
      createTournament in class Tournament

    • getBracketSize

      public int getBracketSize()
      A methdo to get the bracket size of this tournament. Max 256. Will be 2^n, with n less than 8
      Specified by:
      getBracketSize in class Tournament
      Returns:
      the bracket size, which will be the same as the number of matches round 1

    • getTotalNumberOfMatches

    • getNumberOfRounds

      public int getNumberOfRounds()
      method to get the number of rounds of a tournament. If the tournament has 16 teams, 2^4, and therefore there will be 4 rounds. Rounds = n, where 2^n is the size
      Specified by:
      getNumberOfRounds in class Tournament
      Returns:
      the total number of rounds
